00036 #include "PACC/Threading/Exception.hpp"
00037 #include "PACC/config.hpp"

00039 #ifdef PACC_SOCKET_WIN32
00041 #include <winsock2.h>

00043 #else
00045 #include <sys/errno.h>

00048 #include <sstream>

00050 using namespace std;
00051 using namespace PACC;
00052 
00054 Threading::Error Threading::Exception::convertNativeError(int inError)
00055 {
00056     Error lCode;
00057     switch(inError)
00058     {
00059 #ifdef PACC_THREADS_WIN32
00060         case ERROR_NOT_OWNER: lCode = eMutexNotOwned; break;
00061 #else
00062         case EPERM: lCode = eMutexNotOwned; break;
00063         case EDEADLK: lCode = eWouldDeadLock; break;
00064 #endif
00065         default: lCode = eOtherError;
00066     }
00067     return lCode;
00068 }
00069 
00071 string Threading::Exception::getMessage() const throw()
00072 {
00073     ostringstream lMessage;
00074     switch(mCode)
00075     {
00076         case eMutexNotOwned: lMessage << "MutexNotOwned"; break;
00077         case eWouldDeadLock: lMessage << "WouldDeadLock"; break;
00078         case eRunning: lMessage << "Running"; break;
00079         default: lMessage << "OtherError"; break;
00080     }
00081     if(mNativeCode) lMessage << " (" << mNativeCode << "): ";
00082     else lMessage << ": ";
00083     return string("Threading: ")+lMessage.str()+what();
00084 }
